about_the_game:
One day when my parents were away, Ally, a sleeping doll, woke up!
I need to find clues hidden throughout the house and re-seal Ally...
What is true and what is false!



1. Find the things in the house!
There are 10 clues hidden in the house that are needed to seal Ally. But to keep you out of the way, Ally hid a false cue and a curse that she triggered the moment she picked it up.


2. Special paper used to seal Ally in the past
All the clues you acquire are recorded on this paper. You can check them anytime by pressing the [R] key. This paper has special powers, so you can decipher false clues and curses, except for true clues, by attaching them in your hand and interacting with candles in your house.


3. Make good use of the flashlight.
The flashlight has special features. Switch the lights through the keys [1], [2], and [3] to make it useful for the game.
[1] Light: Primary flashlight
[2] Blue Light: You can find traces of Ally's passing inside the house.
[3] Red Light: A powerful weapon that can disable Ally for a while. Look for acquisitions in the house and act to unlock that function.


4. Get rid of Ally!
Collect 10 real clues and you'll find all the information to seal Ally.
Find a trail of the truth and succeed in exorcising Ally by avoiding the deception of Ally!
